author: Alex Sherman
title: NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell says he has tested positive for COVID-19 in e-mail to staff
description: NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell said he has tested positive for COVID-19 in an e-mail to staff. He wrote that he is improving every day while working remotely.
content:
New NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell said he has tested positive for COVID-19 in an e-mail sent to NBCUniversal staff.
Shell wrote that he is "improving every day" while working remotely in Los Angeles. He emphasized that NBC staff that can work from home should … [+704 chars]
